==Sub Stat Slot Upgrade Times==
When the artifact already has four sub-stats, the chance a selected substat can be upgraded n times is:

| 1 time || 39.55%
|-
| 2 times || 26.37%
|-
| 3 times || 8.79%
|-
| 4 times || 1.46%
|-
| 5 times || 0.10%
